dialogue.name: Yvyteph Intro Root
text: Greetings, brave Maya. I am Yvyteph, goddess of Desire. My roots run through all that lives and feels, and are knotted even more thoroughly in you than most of your kind.
You have been worshipping me all your life, even though you didn't know my face until today. Now that we have looked upon each other I know that you will serve me all the more passionately.

dialogue.name: Maya Is Confusion
text: Hi! Um. I'm Maya. Very happy to meet you!

dialogue.name: Maya is Curiosity
text: So... can I ask about your nips? Why does a tree lady need nipples? And kinda moreover, why boobs?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Free Them
text: For fun, of course; same thing yours are for 90% of the time. If you wish you may also suckle the essence of molten Desire from them. Is this your wish?
As for my enlarged breasts, well they're just lovely. And also joyous to play with!

dialogue.name: Maya Stranger Danger
text: Cool, cool. Uh, maybe when we know each other a little better. They certainly are lovely... *ahem* ANyway...
Although, I have always wondered what molten Desire tastes like.

dialogue.name: Maya in Heat
text: Goddess of Desire, eh? I do see that.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Free Them
text: For fun, of course; same thing yours are for 90% of the time. If you wish you may also suckle the essence of molten Desire from them. Is this your wish? As for my enlarged breasts, well they're just lovely.

choices.text: Where am I? This place seems kinda rough-hewn, and I recall having a face and not being quite so low-poly.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Megyle Mystery
text: This world is a pocket dimension within the manifestation of my daughter Qyvnily that has taken root on Meigantu. We went to great pains to recreate a perfectly familiar setting and morphology for you.
Do you remember embracing her? The serpentfolk were chasing you. Your friends from the Chiropteran are all dead.
We offered you sanctuary. In exchange, we wish to learn from you. Your Desire is powerful, and your imagination keen.
The Incarnate Daughter has been sculpted from your own longing. Perhaps she will benefit from your guidance, should you prove cunning enough to overcome our trials.
